Returns: the attributes of suggestions. This includes whether the spell checker has the word in its dictionary or not and whether the spell checker has confident suggestions for the word or not.

Returns: the count of the suggestions. If there's no suggestions at all, this method returns -1. Even if this method returns 0, it doesn't necessarily mean that there are no suggestions for the requested word. For instance, the caller could have been asked to limit the maximum number of suggestions returned.
